page.title: 06TOURIST INFORMATION CENTRE
page.content: GALASHIELS IS ONE OF THE MAIN TOWNS IN THE AREA KNOWN AS 'THE BORDERS'.THE TOWN IS SURROUNDED BY SOME OF THE MOST BEAUTIFUL COUNTRYSIDE TO BE FOUND IN THE WHOLE OF THE BRITISH ISLES. IN ORDER TO ENCOURAGE VISITORS ON HOLIDAY TO ENJOY THEIR TIME IN THE AREA,A TOURIST INFORMATION CENTRE IS SITUATED IN A SMALL PORTACABIN AT THE FOOT OF BANK STREET BRAE.THE STAFF PROVIDE INFORMATION ON THE TOWN AND SURROUNDING AREA. THIS INCLUDES PLACES TO VISIT OR PLACES TO STAY WHILE ON HOLIDAY. IN THE WINTER THE CENTRE IS USED BY THE YOUTH ENQUIRY SERVICE(Y.E.S.)WHICH IS CONCERNED WITH ANSWERING ANY ENQUIRIES YOUNGER PEOPLE MAY HAVE BUT DO NOT KNOW WHICH OFFICIAL AGENCY TO APPROACH.
